ReviewText:
Last year, I had sinus fluid flowing down my throat, causing a cough
The male doctor here examined me for 5 days and the medicine stopped my cough …

Author: van vu nguyen
ReviewText:
This is a reputable hospital with modern equipment.
Highly professional, dedicated and thoughtful doctor.
Quick and effective medical examination and treatment.
Location: 200 m near Ong Cu Temple intersection

Author: Xuân Quyền Ngô
ReviewText: The hospital is not very big but is clean, tidy, airy, has trees, parking for motorbikes and cars, a convenient vending machine for water, and a map to the floors that is easy to see and convenient for travel. The staff is enthusiastic, …

Author: Dùng Sao Lý
ReviewText: You should only come to this hospital to examine minor illnesses, headaches and runny noses... Applying for a leave of absence with social insurance benefits is quite simple and quick for patients. The service is quite dedicated, but many …

Author: Linh Sky
ReviewText: You really are stupid to run here. The ultrasound doctor's attitude was as if the patient was begging for something. Unsatisfactory results also bring frustration to people.

Author: Tường Trịnh
ReviewText: All the interns don't do well. 2 million said 8 million, I have to tell the manager to apologize or it will take a long time.

Author: hau Thai
ReviewText: Good.ok

Author: Lê Yến
ReviewText: Ok, before I saw the fees were so high. So I haven't gone there for a long time, now I'm back and it's changed.

Author: Phúc Domi
ReviewText:
The hospital is bad, making money from patients
Blood tests are drawn every day but results are not available
Professional staff unloading bad

Author: xquang phuong
ReviewText: The hospital is spacious and the staff is enthusiastic and attentive.

Author: Tram Vo
ReviewText: The hospital has no conscience and only knows how to make money from the people. It only has intestinal diseases, saying it is appendicitis and requires immediate surgery. Is it worthless to consider other people's lives? Too careless business

Author: Đỗ Thế dương
ReviewText: The doctor's expertise is so bad. I had an earache and took medicine for almost a month but it didn't get better. I took so much medicine that I was discouraged. There's insurance but the medical fees are so unreasonable.

Author: Sĩ Đỗ Duy
ReviewText: The staff is too bad, showing an unpleasant attitude without giving any instructions. In an epidemic situation, hospital staff do not wear masks????

Author: Thuỷ Trần
ReviewText: Taking blood with a few pills costing more than 1 million, the cashier taking the money had a very bad attitude, money was lost

Author: Bảo Nguyễn Quốc
ReviewText: Doctors are not on duty at the clinic during office hours

Author: Hoàng Chiến
ReviewText: Regarding the cost, you say it's expensive, but in my opinion, you should buy health insurance. The cost won't be expensive. Besides, Vietnamese doctors are very dedicated to their patients, so they should be examined at Van Phuc.

Author: nơi tôi miền quê
ReviewText: The hospital is so bad, it just wants to extort money from others, stitch the patient's wounds, the doctor has an appointment to remove the stitches, comes and asks for money for all kinds of examinations.

Author: Kim Miranda
ReviewText: Enthusiastic medical staff

Author: Minh Tran
ReviewText:
Good service, few people, clean.
However, the attitude of the doctor/staff member (female) taking the laboratory samples (No. 4) was very unpleasant.
On duty Saturday, January 22, 2022, 10:06 am.

Author: Lan Nguyen
ReviewText: I was very pleased when I came to the Department of Physical Medicine and Pharmacy

Author: Ha Thai
ReviewText: The medical team worked vaguely, probably picked up some homeless people from the street to work. When I went to see a doctor for rhinitis, they ordered a blood test. While I was waiting for too long, the nurse was working on her phone, ignoring the patient and speaking rudely....

Author: Công Linh 96
ReviewText: Hospital lacks medicine

Author: Gia Yen Tran
ReviewText: Bad attitudes from the security guards to the nurses and all the staff, nothing can be resolved, the customer service department does not resolve it, the switchboard curses customers directly, I don't know if there is personnel training or not. In short, too bad

Author: Cũ xem lại Phim
ReviewText: The attitude when filling in the medical examination file is not very good, the patient is not easy to hear (she stopped talking to the air-conditioned room and remember to close the door when entering and exiting).

Author: Kênh Giải Trí
ReviewText: 2 stars for the hospital because the fees are too expensive. The tests and blood draws are unreasonable. Only the nurses are enthusiastic.

Author: thi hong
ReviewText: The hospital makes money. In the bill, it says insurance is deducted, but when the money is taken, not a penny is deducted. Damn it

Author: phi lê
ReviewText: The hospital makes money, the doctors and nurses' attitudes are so bad

Author: Huyên Đặng Thị Hồng
ReviewText: Bv is very dedicated

Author: Huyền Nguyễn
ReviewText: Is the delivery service here good? And what are the costs for normal delivery and cesarean section?

Author: Cúc Đậu
ReviewText: Had 2 cesarean sections at the hospital, the doctors were very attentive. Thank you for taking care of me.

Author: Văn Núi Nguyễn
ReviewText: Friendly staff

Author: viet hoang
ReviewText: The hospital serves well, cares for and takes care of patients wholeheartedly

Author: Huong Nguyen
ReviewText: Too bad I only had a medical check-up for 2 hours

Author: Góc Nhỏ Cần Thơ
ReviewText: Pretty good, dedicated doctor, clear process. The medicine is effective

Author: Trang Huynh
ReviewText: Any hospital that has insurance is the same as not having it. It's better to use insurance and pay for medical examination than not having insurance at all.

Author: Hửu Nhân Nguyễn
ReviewText: Asking without answering, showing contempt for patients and their families

Author: Hoanh Thu
ReviewText: The hospital is clean, the doctors care about patients

Author: Định Lê
ReviewText: The medical staff spoke harshly, had an unfriendly attitude, spoke in a motherly voice, and did not deserve to go to the doctor

Author: Nguyen Tuong
ReviewText: The hospital is very good and worth experiencing the service

Author: làu hồ
ReviewText: Waiting time is too long. Submitted the test sample form but still haven't received my turn after 30 minutes

ReviewText: High price but well worth it. Especially the nurses and doctors in the emergency department, they are extremely enthusiastic

Author: Phung Minh
ReviewText: Asked me if I was sick so ji Hok, I said Hok was, how could I know if Hok was okay. Kkkk
